page.title: 02LOWER AND MIDDLE SCHOOLS
page.content:
There are two schools in this area, covering the age range 5-13 years. These are Leedon Lower School and Brooklands Middle School.Leedon Lower School is eighteen years old. It was opened to cater for Infant children but with the adoption of the three tier system it became a Lower School with children of 5-9 years of age. Today it has 235 children on roll,drawn from a mixed catchment area, including R.A.F. personnel and private and council housing. Brooklands Middle School is approximately 25 years old. It opened as a Secondary Modern School. As with Leedon, in 1977, it changed its role to that of a Middle School. It draws children from 7 Lower Schools.
, .
